data.title: ScienceDaily: Your source for the latest research news
data.meta_description: Breaking science news and articles on global warming, extrasolar planets, stem cells, bird flu, autism, nanotechnology, dinosaurs, evolution -- the latest discoveries in astronomy, anthropology, biology, chemistry, climate & environment, computers, engineering, health & medicine, math, physics, psychology, technology, and more -- from the world's leading universities and research organizations.
data.text:
Ships Now Spew Less Sulfur, but Warming Sped Up

GE Wood Can Store Carbon, Cut Emissions

Parents Who Use Humor: Strong Relationships

Shape-Changing Metamaterial and Vintage Toys

No Existential Threat to Humanity from AI

Peer Social Genetic Effects

Deep Down Oceans of Water On Mars

Efficient Optical Neural Networks

Bowhead Whale Relationships

Creating Unique Molecular Building Blocks

ScienceDaily features breaking news about the latest discoveries in science, health, the environment, technology, and more -- from leading universities, scientific journals, and research organizations.

Visitors can browse more than 500 individual topics, grouped into 12 main sections (listed under the top navigational menu), covering: the medical sciences and health; physical sciences and technology; biological sciences and the environment; and social sciences, business and education. Headlines and summaries of relevant news stories are provided on each topic page.

Stories are posted daily, selected from press materials provided by hundreds of sources from around the world. Links to sources and relevant journal citations (where available) are included at the end of each post.

For more information about ScienceDaily, please consult the links listed at the bottom of each page.
